context:
Illinois?   You folks keep this up and you'll have to start having legislative sessions in prison.

You don't have over 33,000 gangs operating efficiently in this country without substantial help from the "inside".    And Chicago has been the shining example of that for over 125 years.
Say it ain't so, a Democrat politician in Chicago being charged with corruption and taking bribes.. I thought that was standard operating procedure in the Democrat handbook.
I guess the "BIG GUY" didn't get his 10%............
Liberal democrat in Chicago - a new puzzle but just as easy.
I guess he forgot the 10% for the "Big Guy".
Illinois……where are former governors make our license plates! Nothing new here….Dems doing what they do best!

Go after that 5K bribe?
Now do the 2 billion+ from the Saudis.
There is only a 13% chance it will ever do any jail time.  I wonder if he learned this from Jones II or is he branching out?
Any one want to solve the puzzle on this one??

"The charges brought against my son, Emil Jones III, do not reflect the man he is. Everyone knows he is an honest, hardworking legislator."

How can he be honest when he was seeking a bribe?  Only in the minds of Democrats does such a notion even occur.
'Honest and hardworking' have a different meaning when applied to Illinois politics
It's the South side of Chicago!   This isn't news, it's a way of life.
Plenty of democrats  getting caught in corruption schemes lately.
when did Chicago become a state?
